name: Age of Chips: The Prototype
description:
Submission for JamCraft 4, made in a couple of days.

"It's 2119, energy is scarce, computers are too much, just Chips is the future"

You are given a board and some electronic parts and you have to make a circuit that will meet the output requierments.

Shortcuts:
- Z: Toggle the editor type
- X: Toggle the editor action

Unforntonatly I wasn't able to finish, this is what I have created so far.
